listAllPlayers: SELECT p.nom_perso AS nom, p.id_perso AS matricule, p.clan AS camp, tu.nom_unite AS 'type', p.bataillon AS bataillon, g.nom_grade AS grade, p.xp_perso as xp, IF( pic.attenteValidation_compagnie = 0, c.nom_compagnie, 'Indépendant') AS compagnie FROM perso p LEFT JOIN perso_as_grade pag ON pag.id_perso = p.id_perso LEFT JOIN grades g ON g.id_grade = pag.id_grade LEFT JOIN type_unite tu ON p.type_perso = tu.id_unite LEFT JOIN perso_in_compagnie pic ON pic.id_perso = p.id_perso LEFT JOIN compagnies c ON c.id_compagnie = pic.id_compagnie WHERE p.id_perso >= 100
listAllPlayersSideCharts: SELECT count(*) AS compte, p.clan AS camp FROM perso p WHERE p.est_gele = 0 AND p.est_renvoye = 0 AND p.clan IN (1,2) AND p.id_perso >= 100 AND p.DLA_perso > NOW() - INTERVAL ? DAY GROUP BY p.clan ORDER BY p.clan
listAllPlayersGrouillotCharts: SELECT count(*) AS compte, p.clan AS camp, tu.nom_unite AS 'type' FROM perso p LEFT JOIN type_unite tu ON p.type_perso = tu.id_unite WHERE p.est_gele = 0 AND p.est_renvoye = 0 AND p.id_perso >= 100 AND p.DLA_perso > NOW() - INTERVAL ? DAY GROUP BY p.clan, tu.nom_unite
listAllPlayersGradeCharts: SELECT count(*) AS compte, p.clan AS camp, g.nom_grade AS 'grade' FROM perso p LEFT JOIN perso_as_grade pag ON pag.id_perso = p.id_perso LEFT JOIN grades g on pag.id_grade = g.id_grade LEFT JOIN type_unite tu on tu.id_unite = p.type_perso WHERE p.est_gele = 0 AND p.est_renvoye = 0 AND tu.nom_unite = 'Chef' AND p.DLA_perso > NOW() - INTERVAL ? DAY AND p.id_perso >= 100 GROUP BY p.clan, g.nom_grade ORDER by g.pc_grade
listAllPgCharts: SELECT sum(g.point_armee_grade) AS compte, p.clan AS camp FROM perso p LEFT JOIN perso_as_grade pag ON pag.id_perso = p.id_perso LEFT JOIN grades g on g.id_grade = pag.id_grade WHERE p.est_gele = 0 AND p.est_renvoye = 0 AND p.clan IN (1,2) AND p.id_perso >= 100 AND p.DLA_perso > NOW() - INTERVAL ? DAY GROUP BY p.clan ORDER BY p.clan
listAllXpCharts: SELECT sum(p.xp_perso) AS compte, p.clan AS camp FROM perso p WHERE p.est_gele = 0 AND p.est_renvoye = 0 AND p.clan IN (1,2) AND p.id_perso >= 100 AND p.DLA_perso > NOW() - INTERVAL ? DAY GROUP BY p.clan ORDER BY p.clan
listAllXpByGradeCharts: SELECT SUM(p.xp_perso)/count(*) AS compte, p.clan AS camp, g.nom_grade AS 'grade' FROM perso p LEFT JOIN perso_as_grade pag ON pag.id_perso = p.id_perso LEFT JOIN grades g on pag.id_grade = g.id_grade LEFT JOIN type_unite tu on tu.id_unite = p.type_perso WHERE p.est_gele = 0 AND p.est_renvoye = 0 AND tu.nom_unite = 'Chef' AND p.DLA_perso > NOW() - INTERVAL ? DAY AND p.id_perso >= 100 GROUP BY p.clan, g.nom_grade ORDER by g.pc_grade
listAllArmes: SELECT SUM(pourcentage)/ count(pourcentage) AS 'precision', SUM(degats)/count(degats) AS degats, count(pourcentage) AS attaques, a.nom_arme AS arme, p.clan AS camp FROM log l LEFT JOIN arme a ON a.id_arme = l.id_arme JOIN perso p ON p.id_perso = l.id_perso WHERE type_action like 'attaque%' AND p.id_perso < 50000 GROUP BY l.id_arme, p.clan
listAllCompagnies: SELECT count(pic.id_perso) AS membres, IF( pic.attenteValidation_compagnie = 0, c.nom_compagnie, 'Indépendant') AS nom, c.id_clan as camp FROM perso_in_compagnie pic LEFT JOIN compagnies c ON c.id_compagnie = pic.id_compagnie LEFT JOIN perso p ON p.id_perso = pic.id_perso WHERE p.DLA_perso > NOW() - INTERVAL ? DAY AND pic.attenteValidation_compagnie = 0 GROUP BY c.id_clan, c.id_compagnie ORDER BY membres
listAllCompagniesClanPieChart: SELECT count(pic.id_perso) AS membres, IF( pic.attenteValidation_compagnie = 0, c.nom_compagnie, 'Indépendant') AS nom, c.id_clan as camp FROM perso_in_compagnie pic LEFT JOIN compagnies c ON c.id_compagnie = pic.id_compagnie LEFT JOIN perso p ON p.id_perso = pic.id_perso WHERE p.DLA_perso > NOW() - INTERVAL ? DAY AND pic.attenteValidation_compagnie = 0 AND c.id_clan = ? GROUP BY c.id_clan, c.id_compagnie ORDER BY membres
